trans-unit.source: The modules in this group support a wide range of operations necessary to prepare data for use in machine learning algorithms.
trans-unit.target: The modules in this group support a wide range of operations necessary to prepare data for use in machine learning algorithms.

trans-unit.source: <legacyLink xlink:href="529b4991-8a7f-4e12-8f36-51f9faca4383" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Filter</legacyLink>: Provides tools to work with all kinds of digital signals, to support machine learning tasks such as image recognition, voice recognition, and waveform analysis.
trans-unit.target: <legacyLink xlink:href="529b4991-8a7f-4e12-8f36-51f9faca4383" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Filter</legacyLink>: Provides tools to work with all kinds of digital signals, to support machine learning tasks such as image recognition, voice recognition, and waveform analysis.

trans-unit.source: <legacyLink xlink:href="81c457af-f5c0-4b2d-922c-fdef2274413c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Learning with Counts</legacyLink>: Develop compact features for use in machine learning, by using count-based featurization.
trans-unit.target: <legacyLink xlink:href="81c457af-f5c0-4b2d-922c-fdef2274413c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Learning with Counts</legacyLink>: Develop compact features for use in machine learning, by using count-based featurization.

trans-unit.source: <legacyLink xlink:href="92b32033-f75f-4854-ac8f-9110b3fe7e09" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Manipulate</legacyLink>: Support tasks required for data preparation, including merging datasets, cleaning missing values, grouping and summarizing data, changing the columns names and data types, and indicating which column is label or feature.
trans-unit.target: <legacyLink xlink:href="92b32033-f75f-4854-ac8f-9110b3fe7e09" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Manipulate</legacyLink>: Support tasks required for data preparation, including merging datasets, cleaning missing values, grouping and summarizing data, changing the columns names and data types, and indicating which column is label or feature.

trans-unit.source: <legacyLink xlink:href="73a66797-d6e4-48a1-98c1-2d764ec5d2cd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Sample and Split</legacyLink>: Divide your data intro training and test sets, filter datasets, or perform sampling.
trans-unit.target: <legacyLink xlink:href="73a66797-d6e4-48a1-98c1-2d764ec5d2cd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Sample and Split</legacyLink>: Divide your data intro training and test sets, filter datasets, or perform sampling.

trans-unit.source: <legacyLink xlink:href="345c5ed4-4dd6-4998-9773-6ca0e00e6946" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Scale and Reduce</legacyLink>: Prepare numerical data for analysis by applying normalization, binning, and scaling algorithms, or by removing outliers.
trans-unit.target: <legacyLink xlink:href="345c5ed4-4dd6-4998-9773-6ca0e00e6946" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Scale and Reduce</legacyLink>: Prepare numerical data for analysis by applying normalization, binning, and scaling algorithms, or by removing outliers.

trans-unit.source: The Data Transformation modules fall into the following categories:
